home_title: The New Way of Star Gazing
home_sub_title: Welcome to our Laser Star Guide, Below are the general guidelines
step1_card_body:
Safety is the most important. Please make sure you are in a safe location.

Wear Protective eye wear and dont look at lazer derictly!
